channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Wisconsin Supreme Court rules Republican had no right to bring lawsuit challenging mobile voting
item.description: A divided Wisconsin Supreme Court ruled Tuesday that a Republican Party official lacked the standing to bring a lawsuit challenging the use of a mobil...

item.title: Ed Department cuts $600M in taxpayer-funded grants pushing 'divisive ideologies'
item.description: The Department of Education has canceled $600 million in grants being used to fund training programs for educators on diversity, equity and inclusion.

item.title: Free Speech Is Good, Actually
item.description: JD Vance is right; Germany and CBS are wrong.

item.title: Leader behind migrant flight to Martha's Vineyard tapped to head red state's new immigration board
item.description: Larry Keefe helped organize the flight of dozens of migrants to Martha's Vineyard under the Biden administration and will now help lead Florida's immi...

item.title: Musk compares 'Trump Derangement Syndrome' to rabies
item.description: Elon Musk said he experienced "Trump Derangement Syndrome" at a party he went to before the election and compared it to people contracting rabies.

item.title: Elon Musk protests to target lawmakers, Tesla dealerships as progressives decry 'extremist cuts'
item.description: A left-wing group has released a "tool kit" for nationwide protests against Elon Musk while House lawmakers are out of Washington, D.C.

item.title: Transgender Ideology Is In Retreat, But We Must Fight Until It’s Destroyed
item.description: Those who have staked their livelihoods and reputations on transgender ideology are not going to give up quietly and go away.

item.title: Zuckerberg Doesn’t Want You To Know His Foundation Gave Millions To Anti-Trump Lawfare Sponsor
item.description: The Chan Zuckerberg Initiative deleted hundreds of grants from its website after being called out for funding leftist priorities.

item.title: Some Democrats Look to Weaponize Government Shutdown to Fight DOGE
item.description: Trump is ‘shutting down the government already. And so, we shouldn’t enable a further shutdown of services,’ Eric Swalwell said.

item.title: Trump’s Plan To End The Russia-Ukraine War Is What Should Have Happened 3 Years Ago
item.description: Those outraged by President Donald Trump’s talks with Putin talk about his trashing alliances. But his job is to defend U.S. interests.

item.title: Catch and release is over, DHS says; January saw lowest border numbers since summer of 2020
item.description: Homeland Security saw illegal immigration plummet in January, according to new data published Tuesday that showed the border had the lowest level of m...

item.title: Europe Deserves Its Humiliation
item.description: It must spend more for its own defense, as American leaders have warned for years.

item.title: The fate of Ukraine, &c.
item.description: On Trump, Putin, Zelensky, Orbán, and more.

item.title: New York Times Ethicist Counsels Reader To Fight Racism By Dating Black Women
item.description: Poetic Justice is an advice column that offers better advice to submissions at other publications whose advice has failed the reader.

item.title: Postmaster General DeJoy to step down, calls on board to find successor
item.description: Postmaster General Louis DeJoy announced Tuesday he's leaving his post and urged the Postal Service Board of Governors to start the search for a repla...

item.title: Former Refugee: The United States Should Encourage Less Migration, More Stability
item.description: If we want to help the suffering and vulnerable around the world, it must be done with an eye toward long-term stability for everyone.

item.title: Canada's Brad Marchand says quit booing national anthems: 'Should be off-limits'
item.description: Canadian forward Brad Marchand, who will take the ice against Team USA on Thursday for the NHL's 4 Nations Face-Off title game, has a message for fans...

item.title: DOGE team welcomed at the Pentagon but some remain skeptical
item.description: DOGE looks to investigate the budget for the Pentagon as well as seeing where funds are going for various other departments of the federal government.

item.title: Government Is Wasting Spectra the Private Sector Needs
item.description: Spectrum auctions will accelerate economic development, privatize underutilized government assets, and help pay for DoD’s requested spending.

item.title: Musk is not DOGE employee, has no more authority than other WH staff, new filing says
item.description: The Trump White House made clear that Elon Musk is a White House employee and “has no greater authority than other White House advisors," in a late-ni...
